title: Accidently spent rp instead of ip.
body: at 2:47 est I accidently used rp instead of ip to buy the sad mummy. I really hope there's a chance a rioter will see this and refund that :(. I wanted to use the rp to buy skt t1 elise.

replies.body:
Oh no, that really stinks! D:

You can reach out to our billing team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if there's something we can do to resolve this situation.

Let me know if you have any questions.
